document_data.name: Thoroar
document_data.mainbody: '''Thoroar the Mediogre''' was a merchant who sold his wares on the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Thoroar sold a variety of goods at his merchant's stall, including a variety of [[potion]]s, gold [[trade bar]]s, healing kits that allowed people to treat their own injuries, and even small portable altars that allowed them to pay homage to their deity while far off from a temple.
document_data.History: During the [[Siege of Helm's Hold]] ''circa'' the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, Thoroar set up shop at the [[Last Redoubt]] war camp just outside the city of [[Helm's Hold]].
